title: Micro-batching
subtext: Process small groups of data in short intervals
author: Buzzpy

description.title: Micro-batching
texts: Micro-batching is an optimization technique where small groups of data are processed in short intervals. It is commonly used in data streaming and real-time processing systems to balance the efficiency of batch processing with the responsiveness of real-time systems.
By using micro-batching, systems can reduce latency and improve throughput, making it an effective approach in environments where data needs to be processed quickly and efficiently.
